body_html:
Caused by:

Found NCCL, but the NCCL version is either not 2+ or not determinable, will not compile with NCCL distributed backend

Yet NCCL 2 is installed in the environment. Something is triggering building the bundled version of NCCL (NCCL version 1) and that is taking precedence over the installed one.
body_text:
Caused by:
Found NCCL, but the NCCL version is either not 2+ or not determinable, will not compile with NCCL distributed backend

Yet NCCL 2 is installed in the environment. Something is triggering building the bundled version of NCCL (NCCL version 1) and that is taking precedence over the installed one.
body:
Caused by:

```
Found NCCL, but the NCCL version is either not 2+ or not determinable, will not compile with NCCL distributed backend
```

Yet NCCL 2 is installed in the environment. Something is triggering building the bundled version of NCCL (NCCL version 1) and that is taking precedence over the installed one.
